Text: Holy Crap dude! i was sooooo hoping you were gonna hook us up with this and BAM here it is! i hope it's a good series!!! thanks again PT your the best!
i enjoyed it, tell me what you think after you watch both episodes.

Man, thank you so much, I enjoyed reading the books and when i saw the add i was exited when i found out it would be on cable i hoped someone would upload them, im downloading them both right now. Thanks a lot.
